title: AI-Powered IVR Calling System
subtitle: Intelligent Voice Automation with Smart Human Handoff & Google Sheets Integration
description: Intelligent Voice Automation with Smart Human Handoff & Google Sheets Integration that revolutionized customer follow-ups.

problemStatement.main: The client faced high operational costs and missed opportunities due to limited human availability. Manual dialing caused response delays, inconsistent brand messaging, and poor lead prioritization, resulting in low conversion rates and unscalable support during peak hours.

points.title: LIMITED AVAILABILITY
points.description: Missed leads outside of 9-5 business hours.

points.title: HIGH OPERATIONAL COST
points.description: Call center staffing costs were unsustainable.

points.title: DATA ENTRY ERRORS
points.description: Manual logging led to 95% higher error rates.

points.title: SLOW RESPONSE
points.description: Callback delays cooled down warm leads.

timeline.title: SETUP
timeline.description: Integration of Google Sheets, Telephony setup & Workflow Triggers.

timeline.title: TRAINING
timeline.description: Voice Cloning, Knowledge Base configuration & Handoff logic.

timeline.title: LAUNCH
timeline.description: Testing boundaries, scaling call volume & monitoring analytics.

pipeline.title: Data Integration & Automation
pipeline.description: System pulls prospect data (Name, Reason, History) from Google Sheets and automatically triggers calls based on optimal timing and priority.

pipeline.title: AI Conversation Engine
pipeline.description: Engages prospects with natural, human-like dialogue using custom voice cloning, handling objections, and adapting flow based on responses.

pipeline.title: Smart Human Handoff
pipeline.description: Detects complex queries or frustration and seamlessly transfers the call to a human agent with full context and a warm introduction.

pipeline.title: Omnichannel Follow-up
pipeline.description: Automatically syncs results to CRM, sends SMS confirmations, and updates calendars instantly after call completion.

outcomes.outcome: 24/7 calling capability with zero human limits.
80% reduction in call center operational costs.
92% of users couldn't distinguish AI from human.
Scale from 100 to 10,000 calls without new hires.
